News.headline: Transfer: Assombalonga Joins Billericay Town
News.short_description: The Daggers can announce that forward Chris Assombalonga has joined Billercay Town on a permanent deal
News.description:
Striker Chris Assombalonga has today joined Ryman League club Billericay Town on a permanent deal.

Assombalonga joined the Daggers in June 2016 signing a two year deal, and made 14 appearances for the club scoring one goal and getting one assist.

The Daggers would like to wish Chris all the best for the future and thank him for his contribution for his time at the club.
